General.Name: Hangzhou IECHO Science & Technology Co. Ltd. A
General.Description: Hangzhou IECHO Science & Technology Co., Ltd. manufactures and sells intelligent cutting CNC industrial software systems in China. The company offers automatic intelligent and multi-ply cutting systems, rotary die cutters, large format cutting systems, high speed digital cutting systems, and leather cutting process lines; and software solutions. It serves gasket, apparel, automotive interior, sign and graphic, packaging, composite material, and furniture industries. The company was founded in 1994 and is based in Hangzhou, China.
